binaryPath.label: Cortex Binary Path
binaryPath.help: Path to the cortex binary. Defaults to ~/bin/cortex or cortex in PATH.

embedProvider.label: Embedding Provider
embedProvider.help: Embedding model for semantic/hybrid search. Format: provider/model (e.g., ollama/nomic-embed-text).

searchMode.label: Search Mode
searchMode.help: Default search mode: hybrid (recommended), bm25, or semantic.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture conversation exchanges into Cortex with fact extraction.

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant Cortex memories into context before each AI turn.

recallLimit.label: Recall Limit
recallLimit.help: Maximum memories to inject per turn.

minScore.label: Minimum Score
minScore.help: Minimum search score for auto-recall results.

captureMaxChars.label: Capture Max Chars
captureMaxChars.help: Maximum message length eligible for auto-capture.

extractFacts.label: Extract Facts
extractFacts.help: Run fact extraction on captured memories (recommended).
